participant_1.background:
I like to eat healthy foods so that I have energy to teach my students.
I love to be unique, and I think it's really cool to express myself through my fashion choices.
i only have three best friends.
i like to watch ma.
My parents are proud of me for following my musical dreams.

participant_2.background:
I've had to make a lot of sacrifices for my family, but it's all been worth it.
i eat mainly chinese food.
I love spending time with my family because they are always there for me.
i do not have a college degree.
I keep a healthy weight for my age.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you! I just finished teaching a class of students and I am excited to get home and relax.
That sounds like a fun time! I am sure you are a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best. I love working with children and helping them learn.
That is so great! I am sure your students appreciate it a lot.
I hope so! I know I enjoy teaching them.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch MA, play video games, and spend time with my friends and family.
Those all sound like great ways to relax! I love spending time with my family as well.
What is your favorite thing to do with your family?
I love going on adventures together. We like to go hiking, swimming, and camping.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have always wanted to go camping.
It is a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
I will! Maybe we can go camping together sometime.
